div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1526 Seleuceia Pieria, Seleucis, 1932-1939 Burial: c. 250 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 12 AR. From excavations Alexander III: 1 early post. tetradr. (An- tigoneia on the Orontes) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. (unc. mint) Ptolemy I: 1 tetradr. (Alexandreia) Ptolemy II: 7 tetradr. (Alexandreia 3, Tyre 1, Sidon 1, Joppa 1, Gaza 1) Ptolemy I or II: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Antakya Waage, Antioch on the Orontes, IV.2 (Princeton, 1952), p. 74, no. 788; p. 75, no. 789; p. 90, nos. 961, 964-5, 969-74
